quote: ...like a small stone deflected off a larger one, my brother had spun off toward the Almighty, though to my mind the events of that morning could just as well have cast him the other way.
quote_letters: LIKE A SMALL STONE DEFLECTED OFF A LARGER ONE MY BROTHER HAD SPUN OFF TOWARD THE ALMIGHTY THOUGH TO MY MIND THE EVENTS OF THAT MORNING COULD JUST AS WELL HAVE CAST HIM THE OTHER WAY
